title: Subtitle Workshop
description: Edit, create, and manage subtitles for your videos

quickActions.description: Choose how you want to start or continue editing.

quickActions.createHint: Start from a blank subtitle timeline.

hints.title: How To Use
hints.description: Complete guide for editing, syncing, QC, AI workflows, and export.

steps.openOrCreate: Open subtitle file, download subtitles from URL, or create a new file.
steps.editAndSync: Edit text/time in the table and sync with video preview.
steps.qcAndFix: Review realtime QC indicators (CPS/WPM/CPL, duration, gap, overlap).
steps.waveformAndShot: Use waveform/spectrogram timeline and shot-sync to tighten timing.
steps.aiAndTranslate: Use Whisper, AI Translate, Grammar Fix, and Translator Mode when needed.
steps.exportAndBatch: Save/export current file, or run batch convert and project append tools.

features.fileOps: Open / New / Close / Save / Export formats (SRT, VTT, ASS)

features.waveform: Waveform + spectrogram timeline with drag timing handles
features.qc: Realtime QC panel with profile-based thresholds
features.splitMerge: Split & Merge tools for long lines and selected blocks
features.styleProfiles: Style profiles: YouTube, Netflix-like, Broadcast, Short-form
features.translateMode: Translator mode with side-by-side source and target text
features.aiTools: AI tools: Whisper generation, translation, grammar/style fix
features.batchProject: Batch/project tools: multi-file convert and append
